details: The script launches an MPI application called "smaug" using mpirun with the specified options. It utilizes the MVAPICH2 library for MPI communication. The script also sets various environment variables related to CUDA, GPUDirect, and CPU binding for optimal performance. The script runs on a single node with 12 tasks (ppn=12). The script assumes the application is located in the "bin" directory relative to the script's location. The script runs the application with a set of options, including " -genvall " and " -o init ". The script also gathers data from multiple runs of the application and combines it into a single output file.
